channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: St. John's Erases 15-point Deficit To Beat Seton Hall
item.description: St. John's erased a 15-point second-half deficit to beat Seton Hall and earn its sixth consecutive win.

item.title: MLB Free Agency Rumors, Buzz: Mets Agree To Trade For Luis Robert Jr.
item.description: Keeping track of players who may be on the move, manager comings and goings, and other buzz from around the majors.

item.title: Michigan State‚Äôs Coen Carr Powers In And-One Putback vs. Oregon
item.description: Michigan State Spartans‚Äô Coen Carr cleaned up the miss and finished through contact for an and-one layup against the Oregon Ducks.

item.title: Michigan State‚Äôs Coen Carr splashes 3-pointer to take lead over Oregon
item.description: Coen Carr splashed a 3-pointer that gave the Michigan State Spartans a 33-31 lead over the Oregon Ducks.

item.title: No. 10 Michigan State Spartans vs. Oregon Ducks Highlights üèÄ FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the best moments from this showdown between the No. 10 Michigan State Spartans and the Oregon Ducks!

item.title: Kiper's debut NFL mock draft for 2026: Let's project perfect fits for all 32 first-round picks
item.description: Where will national title game standouts Fernando Mendoza and Akheem Mesidor land in Round 1? And could we really see six WRs in the opening 32 picks?

item.title: Our reporters look ahead to the NFL draft: Big questions for every team selecting in the top 10
item.description: We're three months away from the 2026 NFL draft. What's the latest on each team picking in the top 10? Our reporters weigh in.

item.title: NFL execs predict 2026 moves: Lamar Jackson, A.J. Brown trades coming?
item.description: We asked NFL executives to make bold predictions about this offseason and next season.

item.title: NBA midseason debate: Are the Thunder in trouble? Can the Clippers really climb in the West?
item.description: ESPN analysts Zach Kram and Kevin Pelton break down the league's biggest storylines from leading challengers to surprise contenders.

item.title: NBA All-Star rosters: Starters, snubs and biggest questions
item.description: Who was the biggest surprise or snub? Which superstar duo are we most excited to see? Experts break it down.
